title: Panic meter for Patrick Mahomes injury? Chiefs-Broncos TNF Recap (Football 10/18)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to recap the Chiefs 30-6 victory over the Broncos on Thursday Night Football with a heavy focus on the knee injury Patrick Mahomes suffered in the 2nd quarter. The guys discuss their concern, if Andy Reid is to blame, potential replacement quarterbacks and the bad Broncos.
